description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 v3.0 - Security and Performance

targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("percent_packet_loss") FROM "ping" WHERE ("url" = 'outlook.office365.com') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - (mean("Percent_Free_Space")) FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vboserver$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$disk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(linear)
SELECT "exchangeobject" AS "Item Restored" FROM "veeam_office365_audit_vex" WHERE ("exchangeobject"  != '') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "restorefrom" AS "Restored From:" FROM "veeam_office365_audit_vex" WHERE ("restorefrom" != '') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "restoreto" AS "Restored To:" FROM "veeam_office365_audit_vex" WHERE ("restoreto" != '')   AND $timeFilter
SELECT "message" AS "Item restored" FROM "veeam_office365_audit_vone" WHERE "message" =~ /Item restore completed:*/  AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Microsoft OneDrive for Business Items Restored

targets.query: SELECT "message" AS "Item restored" FROM "veeam_office365_audit_vspo" WHERE "message" =~ /Full URL:*/  AND $timeFilter
SELECT "restkey" AS "RESTAPI Key" FROM "veeam_office365_audit_rest" WHERE  ("restkey"  != '') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 RESTFul API Keys issued

targets.query: SELECT ("timestamp") AS "Timestamp", "restaction" AS "RESTAPI Action" FROM "veeam_office365_audit_rest" WHERE  ("restaction"  != '') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 RESTFul API Completed Queries

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM win_cpu WITH KEY=host
list.label: VBO Server
list.name: vboserver
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM win_cpu WITH KEY=host

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_disk" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$vboserver/
list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_disk" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$vboserver/

title: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 v3.0 - Security and Performance
